benchmark_details.name: FAVABENCH
benchmark_details.overview: A comprehensive benchmark for fine-grained hallucination detection and editing in language models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To benchmark the performance of models in detecting and editing hallucinations in language model outputs.
tasks: Error editing in language model outputs

data.source: FAVABENCH annotations from responses of ChatGPT, Llama2-Chat 7B, and Llama2-Chat 70B on knowledge-intensive queries.
data.format: An annotated dataset identifying hallucinations and their types.
data.annotation: Annotated by trained students with high inter-annotator agreement on identification of hallucinations.

methodology.calculation: Evaluation of performance based on error detection and correction capabilities.
methodology.interpretation: Systems are evaluated on their ability to identify and correct factual errors in model outputs.
methodology.validation: Inter-annotator agreement calculated using Cohen's kappa.

targeted_risks.harm: Potential dissemination of misinformation due to hallucinations in generated outputs.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Data is sourced from publicly available language model outputs.
